price: ‹ ߊ߬ ߣߊ߬ߣߍ߲ › ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߤߍ߲߬ ߌߟߋ߬ ߤߊߙߎߣߊ߫ ߸ ߌ ߣߵߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߝߟߌ߬ߣߍ߲ ߦߋ߫ ߟߊ ߡߎ߲߬ ߞߵߌ ߞߎ߬ߡߊ߲߬ߘߌ߫؟
arabic: قَالَ يَٰهَٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذۡ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ ضَلُّوٓاْ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāhārūnu mā manaʿaka idh ra-aytahum ḍallū
